string.name: name
string.value: Empress's Blessing

string.name: desc
string.value: For every 5 levels on your highest level Cygnus Knight or Mihile character, this skill will gain 1 Skill Point. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the stronger skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Level 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Instantly accelerate boosters to leap forward.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Adds an extra jump when used in midair. Can be used 2 times back to back.

string.name: name
string.value: Radial Nerve

string.name: desc
string.value: Enhances the cybernerve clusters in the lumbar vertebrae to enhance all movement.

string.name: h

string.name: name
string.value: Pinpoint Salvo

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires several missiles to bombard enemies in range. Uses an extra power unit and can be used during flight.

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Supply]#\nEnergy Cost: #powerCon, Damage to enemies in range: #damage%, Number of Missiles: #bulletCount.

string.name: bookName
string.value: Xenon 2nd Job

string.name: name
string.value: Quicksilver: Flash

string.name: desc
string.value: Slashes several distant enemies with the Whip Blade. Change mode with Modal Shift.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.name: name
string.value: Ion Thrust

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses your Surplus Power to summon the Ion Thruster, which damages and pushes back enemies. Hold down the skill key to keep enemies at bay.

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Supply ]#\nEnergy Cost: #powerCon, MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies: #mobCount Damage: #damage%, Knocks back enemies. Duration: #time. Energy is consumed only when the Ion Thrust is summoned.

string.name: name
string.value: Efficiency Streamline

string.name: desc
string.value: Maximizes energy consumption efficiency to increase Max HP and MP. Also provides a passive boost to both HP and MP.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, HP and MP: +#indieMhpR% for #time sec \n[Passive Effect] : HP and MP: +#mhpX

string.value: Xenon Booster

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.name: name
string.value: Diagonal Chase

string.name: desc
string.value: Activates full air boosters to shoot up with explosive power while pushing back enemies. Can be used during Gravity Pillar.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Knock Back

string.name: name
string.value: Gravity Pillar

string.name: desc
string.value: Opens a field of anti-gravitational force to lift enemies into the air. Distant enemies are lifted even higher, and enemies in the energy field drop at a slower rate.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Launches enemies into the air.

string.name: name
string.value: Hybrid Defenses

string.name: desc
string.value: Additional Avoidability: 100%, Any hit/avoids after reduces the Avoidability and damage. Permanently increases the DEF.\n[Required Skill] : #cLv. 5 Perspective Shift#

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Supply]#\nEnergy Cost: #powerCon, Additional Avoidability: +#prop%, Additional Avoidability when hit: -#y%, Damage received when hit: -#z%. Effects removed after #x evasions.\n[Passive Effects] : All Stats: +#strX, Weapon DEF/ Magic DEF: +#pddX

string.name: name
string.value: Aegis System

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a chance to fire defensive missiles when hit by an enemy, or after a successfully evaded attack. The missiles damage the enemy and ignore Attack Reflects. Requires a short standby to fire when activated.

string.name: h
string.value: Chance to fire missiles when hit or evading: #prop%, Damage: #damage%, Number of Missiles: #x, Cooldown: 1.5 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants a chance to attach Airframes to enemies. Attached Airframes will reduce enemy Accuracy and Avoidability, and deal damage when an enemy with 3 attached Airframes is attacked.

string.name: h
string.value: Chance to attach Airframe on attack: #prop%, Max Airframes: 3, Damage when enemy with 3 Airframes is attacked: #damage%, Number of Attacks: 3, Enemy Accuracy and Avoidability for each Airframe: - #x%

string.name: name
string.value: Manifest Projector

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a projection of you that inflicts a portion of the damage you do. It will disappear when it takes damage proportional to your own HP. The projection cannot replicate Pinpoint Salvo or the Aegis System.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Creates a clone hologram. Projection Damage: #y%. Projection disappears after losing #x00% of your max HP.

string.value: Emergency Resupply

string.name: desc

string.value: MP Cost: 64, All skill levels increased by 1 level for 240 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Decent Advanced Blessing

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Accuracy, Avoidability, Max HP, and Max MP. Reduces the amount of MP used when using skills. Can be stacked with other buff skills except for Advanced Blessing.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 120. For 240 seconds - Weapon ATT: +20, Magic ATT: +20, Weapon DEF +425, Magic DEF +425, Accuracy +260, Avoidability +260, Max HP +475, Max MP +475, MP Consumption: -12%

string.value: Decent Speed Infusion

string.name: name

string.name: desc
string.value:
Randomly summons an Ice Spirit, Fire Spirit, or Shadow Spirit to aid you in battle.
Ice Spirit: Has a chance to freeze enemies.
Fire Spirit: Deals continuous fire damage to enemies.
Shadow Spirit: Deals increased damage.

Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Mech: Missile Tank

string.name: desc
string.value:
Activates <Missile Tank> mode during which your meach continuously consumes MP to gain an increased Critical Hit Rate. You can use Seige Mode during Missile Tank mode for increased damage. 
Get on/off your mount by pressing the skill key. 
[To shoot: [#cAttack key#]
[Skills that can be used: #cLaser Blast, Siege Mode#]
Required Skill: #cMech: Siege Mode Lv. 10#

string.value:
Activates Missile Tank mode during which your mech continuously consumes MP to gain an increased Critical Hit Rate. You can use Siege Mode during Missile Tank mode for increased damage. 
Get on/off your mount by pressing the skill key.

Required Skill: #cMech: Siege Mode Lv. 10#

string.value: Satellite Safety

string.value: [Potential Skill]\nConsumes HP and MP to increase your attack speed 1 level for a fixed period of time. It can be stacked with other buffs except Speed Infusion.

string.value: Surging Blade

string.name: name
string.value: Haku Reborn

string.name: desc
string.value: Haku takes human form to fight by Kanna's side.

string.name: h
string.value:
Mana Cost: #epCon, Transformation Duration: #time sec. 
Breath of the Unseen: Haku grants a #prop% chance to resist knock-back and ignore #a% enemy defense.
Haku's Gift: Haku heals you up to #u% of your HP.
Foxfire: Haku summons multiple foxfires for 60 sec. Has a #z% chance to nullify magic. Reflects #x% of damage. Each attack defended against uses up 1 fire.
Haku's Blessing: Haku casts a spell for #vsec to increase Magic Defense by #indieMdd, and Magic Attack by #indieMad% of the equipped fan's Attack Power.

string.name: desc
string.value: Nullifies all enemy magic effects within the targeted area while removing all abnormal conditions suffered by nearby allies. Decreases Divine Protection's cooldown based on the number of treated party members. The Dispel skill can remove critical abnormal conditions, including Knocked Out, Seduction, Confusion, and Zombified.

string.value: Holy Magic Shell

string.name: name
string.value: Final Pact

string.name: desc
string.value: #cWhen HP reaches 0,# your dark contract keeps you alive for a short time and #callows you to use Gungnir's Descent without any cooldown while invincible#. However, you must eliminate the required number of monsters before time runs out, or you will be dragged into the Shadow Abyss. The hourglass will be displayed during the reactivation cooldown.\n[Passive Effect: When HP is higher than the limit, Damage, Movement Speed, Critical Rate, and minimum Critical Damage will be increased]

string.value: #cWhen HP reaches 0,# fully restores HP and MP, Invincibility Duration: #time sec, Ignores enemy's attack reflection, #cIgnores Gungnir's Descent cooldown#. Cooldown: #cooltime sec\n[Passive Effect: When HP is #x% or above, Damage: +#damage%, Movement Speed: +#psdSpeed, Critical Rate: +#cr%, Minimum Critical Damage: +#criticaldamageMin%]

string.name: name
string.value: Myst Eruption

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases Poison Mist's continuous damage. Upon using the skill, nearby Poison Mists explode, dealing fatal damage to enemies. The damage will increase proportional to the number of continuous damage effects applied to the target. You cannot detonate Mists set by others. The damage boost applies up to the 5th effect. If the mist explodes successfully, the cooldown of Flame Haze will reset.\nRequired Skill: #cPoison Mist Lv. 20#

string.value: Summons two random crew members to assist you in battle. If you are targeted by a fatal status effect, a crew member will block it.

string.name: h
string.value: Consumes #mpCon MP, summons two brave crew members to assist you in battle. Crew members summon time #time sec, cooldown #cooltime sec. If you are targeted by an abnormal status effect attack, a crew member will take the hit for you and then disappear.

string.value: Power Unity

string.name: desc

For #time sec, the exclusive buff that increases Min Critical Damage and Max Damage by #x will be activated. Able to stack up to 3 times.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.value: Ahoy Mateys

Crewman Attack: +#v%, When a crewman is summoned: Weapon ATT +#pad

string.name: desc
string.value: Hold down the skill key to continuously fire shells. These shells will explode when hitting enemies or after a short time. #cYou can move left and right while firing#. SP is not required for this skill, and can be used if you learn the #cRapid Fire skill#. The 5th shot will be an extra powerful shell.

string.name: h
string.value: MP #mpCon consumed, fired shells explode on enemy impact or after 0.9 seconds dealing #damage% damage against up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times. string.name: name
string.value: Body Boost

string.name: desc
string.value: Consumes MP to rapidly increase the effects of your active aura for a short time. You must cancel this skill to switch auras. Also, enemy attacks will not cancel the buff.\nRequired Skill: Dark Aura Lv. 10 and above, Yellow Aura Lv.10 and above, Blue Aura Lv. 10 and above.

string.name: h
string.value:
Mana Cost: MP #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Activated auras effects will have the multiplier #x applied to following parts: 
Dark Aura: Damage
Yellow Aura: Attack Speed, Speed, Avoidability
Blue Aura: Distributed Damage Absorption, DEF
Cooldown: #cooltime Sec.

string.name: name
string.value: Defense Break

string.name: desc
string.value: Ignores enemy DEF and Elemental Resistance, and increases maximum critical damage on your attqacks. Also applies to Boss monsters.

string.name: h
string.value: Ignored Enemy DEF: #ignoreMobpdpR%, Ignored Elemental Resistance: #x%, Critical Damge: +#criticaldamageMax%, Boss ATT: +#bdR%

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Ignores enemy DEF and Elemental Resistance, and increases maximum critical damage on your attqacks. Also applies to Boss monsters.

string.name: ph
string.value: Ignored Enemy DEF: #ignoreMobpdpR%, Ignored Elemental Resistance: #x%, Critical Damge: +#criticaldamageMax%, Boss ATT: +#bdR%

string.name: name
string.value: Black Blessing

string.name: desc
string.value: A dark orb forms when you evade attacks for a short time in battle. Accumulating orbs will also increase Magic ATT. If you take any damage, one orb will be destroyed and absorb some of the damage.

string.name: h
string.value:
Creates a dark orb to protect you from all attacks for #time sec. If you take damage, one orb of darkness will break and absorb #x% of damage.
[Boost to Magic Attack when orbs are accumulated]
1 orb: +#u Magic Attack
2 orbs: +#v Magic Attack
3 orbs: +#y Magic Attack

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses the Dragon Crystal as a catalyst to maximize damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: +#indieDamR%, Duration: #time sec

string.name: name
string.value: Lightning Edge

string.name: desc
string.value: Dashes through multiple enemies. Ignores collision with bosses while attacking.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks while moving forward: #attackCount, Debuff while attacking boss: Ishtar's Ring Damage: +#x%, Duration: #time sec.

string.value:
With #x STR: #y% for Power Stance
With #x DEX: #z% resistance to all elements and status ailments
With #x LUK: #u% Avoidability
With #x STR, DEX, and LUK: +#w% total damage, MHP/MMP: +#s%

string.name: name
string.value: Flying Battle Chair Mount

string.name: desc
string.value: Able to attack by using Space Bar while riding on the Flying Battle Chair Mount.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can set the angle and power before you shoot the cannon.

string.name: name
string.value: Seal Harpoon

string.name: desc
string.value: If you hit a spot with a harpoon, you can seal that part.

string.name: name
string.value: Time Distortion

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon the power of the Transcendents to distort local time.

string.name: h
string.value:
Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Area of Time is created for #time sec 
#c[Enemies within the area]#: Every #subTime sec, buff cancels, damage taken increases by #x%, and stuns 
#c[Party members within the area]#: Every 4 sec, Nullify Magic and removes Abnormal Status 
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: This skill is unlocked at Lv. 110.

string.name: name
string.value: Temple Recall

string.name: desc
string.value: Return to Zero's Temple.

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, returns to Zero's Temple \n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: name
string.value: Divine Force

string.name: desc
string.value: Channels the power of the Transcendents to increase Attack Power, Defense, and Resistance of all nearby party members. \nPress the #cSkill Key one more time to cancel the skill. Cannot be used with Divine Speed.#

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, increases Weapon ATT by #indiePad, Magic ATT by #indieMad, Weapon Defense by #indiePdd, Magic Defense by #indieMdd, all Elemental Resistance by #indieTerR%, and all Abnormal Status Resistance by #indieAsrR%

string.name: name
string.value: Divine Speed

string.name: desc
string.value: Channels the power of the Transcendents to increase Attack Speed, Movement Speed, Avoidability, and Accuracy of nearby party members. \nPress the #cSkill Key one more time to cancel the skill. Cannot be used with Divine Force.#

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, increases Movement Speed by #indieSpeed, Jump by #indieJump, Avoidability by #indieEva, Accuracy by #indieAcc, and Attack Speed by 1 level

string.name: name
string.value: Burst Jump

string.name: desc
string.value: Compresses time while jumping to extend your jump.

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, while jumping, use the jump key to jump certain distance\n#cCan be linked with Burst Step

string.name: name
string.value: Burst Step

string.name: desc
string.value: Compresses local time to move quickly.

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, press arrow keys UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT and then use the skill to move in the corresponding direction \nDouble-tap UP UP, DOWN DOWN, LEFT LEFT, RIGHT RIGHT to move in that direction\n#cCan be used on a ladder or rope. Can be linked with Burst Jump

string.name: desc
string.value: When you attack the enemy with a skill, the duration is adjusted and the cooldown is reduced. Grants a special buff effect depending on the attacker.

string.name: h
string.value:
Reduces Zero's attack skill cooldown by 4 seconds.
#c[Detect]#: When Alpha attacks, Critical Rate increases by 3% for 20 seconds. Can stack up to 10 times.
#c[Strength]#: When Beta attacks, damage increases by 1% for 20 seconds. Can stack up to 10 times
#cEffect for [Detect] and [Strength] remains even when tagged.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This skill is unlocked at Lv. 100.

string.name: name
string.value: Rhinne's Protection

string.name: desc
string.value: Receive the Goddess Rhinne's protection, increasing all stats of team members for a short time.

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Increases all stats by #x% for #time sec

string.name: name
string.value: Burst Leap

string.name: desc
string.value: Speeds up vertical movement.

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, when you double-tap ↑↑ or ↓↓, you dash in that direction

string.name: name
string.value: Dual Combat

string.name: desc
string.value: A battle style unique to Alpha and Beta.

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Tag]#: While on standby, use Zero's skills to switch attackers \n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec \n#c[Assist]#: After using Tag to switch, for up to 3 seconds, use Assist for fire support.

string.name: name
string.value: Dual Combat

string.name: desc
string.value: A battle style unique to Alpha and Beta.

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Tag]#: While on standby, use Zero's skills to switch attackers \n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec \n#c[Assist]#: After using Tag to switch, for up to 3 seconds, use Assist for fire support.

string.name: desc
string.value: Capture this moment in your Hourglass. If you get knocked out, time will rewind to the captured moment instead.

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, when you get knocked out, you use up the buff instead, restoring all HP \n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: This skill is unlocked at Lv. 140.

string.name: name
string.value: Time Holding

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleash a temportal torrent that resets your skill cooldowns, makes you invincible, and gives you unlimited HP and Time Force.

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Invincible for #time sec, reset cooldown for all Zero's skills \n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: This skill is unlocked at Lv. 120.

string.name: name
string.value: Doubletime Recon

string.name: desc
string.value: For every stack, gain 3% Critical Rate.

string.name: h
string.value: When attacking, Critical Rate +#x% for #time sec. Max stacks: #maxLevel

string.name: name
string.value: Doubletime Combat

string.name: desc
string.value: For every stack, gain 1% damage.

string.name: h
string.value: When attacking, damage +#x% for #time sec. Max stacks: #maxLevel

string.name: name
string.value: Rising Slash

string.name: desc
string.value: Launches enemies in front of you into the air.

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.name: name
string.value: Air Raid

string.name: desc
string.value: Attacks enemies in front of you, stomping on them in midair.\n[Skill Requirement]: #cRising Slash Lv. 1# \n[Command]: Use #cRising Slash# twice in a row.

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.name: name
string.value: Air Riot

string.name: desc
string.value: A more powerful Air Raid, increasing its damage and giving it a wide shockwave.\n[Skill Requirement]: #cAir Raid Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount.\n#c[Shock Wave]#: Damage: #z%, Number of Attacks: #s, Max Enemies Hit: #x. Chance of Stun: #u%, Duration: #q sec.

string.name: name
string.value: Air Riot Shock Wave

string.name: desc
string.value: Generates a large shockwave outside Air Riot's normal attack range. Enemies that are hit have a chance of being stunned.

string.name: h
string.value: Attack up to #mobCount enemies at #damage% ATT #attackCount times.\nThe enemies have a #prop% chance of being Stunned for #time seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Heavy Sword Mastery

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the Mastery, Attack Power, and Attack Speed of Heavy Sword type weapons. When attacking with a Heavy Sword type weapon, damage increase as the number of enemies hit decreases.

string.name: h
string.value: Permanent Heavy Sword Mastery Increase #mastery%, Boss ATT: +#bdR%, Attack Power: +#padX, Attack Speed: +2 step.\nThe fewer monsters hit, the more damage it will do (#mobCountDamR% per monster).

string.name: name
string.value: Moon Strike

string.name: desc
string.value: Draws enemies closer with a brutal attack.

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.name: name
string.value: Piercing Thrust

string.name: desc
string.value: Thrusts your Long Sword foward to knock back enemies with the tip. \n[Skill Requirements]: #cMoon Strike Lv. 1# \n[Command]: While Moon Strike is active activate #cMoon Strike# again

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.name: name
string.value: Shadow Strike

string.name: desc
string.value: Quickly move to the nearest enemy and attack, \nunleashing a strike that penetrates and deals additional damage. [Skill Requirements]: #cPiercing Thrust Lv. 1# \n[Command]: Activate #cMoon Strike# after Piercing Thrust

string.value: Shadow Strike Blade

string.name: desc
string.value: Slide forward during Shadow Strike to pierce a row of enemies.

string.value: Long Sword Mastery

string.value: Permanent Long Sword Mastery Increase: #mastery%, Attack Power: +#padX, Speed: +#psdSpeed, Jump: +#psdJump, Attack Speed: +3 step, Ignores #ignoreMobpdpR% of enemy defense.

string.value: Flash Cut

Spin like a whirlwind for a short time and attack enemies nearby. 
Use the Left and Right arrow keys while spinning to move. 
[Skill Requirements]: #cSpin Driver Lv. 1# 
[Command]: While Spin Driver is activated use #cSpin Driver# again

string.name: name
string.value: Falling Star

string.value:
Jumps into the air, driving your sword into the ground in one decisive blow.
Creates a shockwave on impact that does damage. 
[Skill Requirements]: #cGiga Crash Lv. 1# 
[Command]: While Giga Crash is active use #cGiga Crash# again

string.name: name
string.value: Earth Break

string.name: desc
string.value:
Jumps high into the air, bringing down the Great Sword hard enough to split the ground beneath you.
Creates a shockwave on impact that does damage. 
[Skill Requirements]: #cFalling Star Lv. 1# 
[Command]: While Giga Crash is active use #cFalling Star#

string.value: Advanced Earth Break

string.value: Critical Bind

string.value: Grants a chance to bind enemies in place when Beta attacks. Affected enemies will bleed and be more vulnerable to Alpha’s attacks.

string.value:
Beta's Attack Bind Chance: #prop%, Duration: #time
Targets have #x% additional Critical Rate when Alpha attacks.
The Bind effect will expire after inflicting damage proportional to the remaining effect duration
#cTargets of this skill's effect will be immune to Critical Bind for 15 sec#

Time Force Cost: #forceCon,

string.name: name
string.value: Decent Advanced Blessing

string.value: Time Force Cost: 5. For 240 seconds - Weapon ATT: +20, Magic ATT: +20, Weapon DEF +425, Magic DEF +425, Accuracy +260, Avoidability +260, Max HP +475

string.value: Decent Speed Infusion

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Master Level: 1]
Allows you to travel by riding a mount. 
If you have the #Soaring# skill, press the Up Arrow and the Jump keys to ascend. 
Consumes 5 MP when activated. 
Max Flight Time: #0 seconds#
